body.name: ZQUYAJ Bookshelf, 3 Tier Industrial Bookcase, Metal Small Bookcase, Rustic Book Shelf Storage Organizer for Living Room, Bedroom, and Home Office Black SJ2303-3-Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 17 hrs 14 mins
features: 【Upgraded Bookshelf】After doing research on all the bookshelf in the market, we carefully designed this outstanding quality book shelves , back X-shaped wire design, can effectively enhance the stability of the skinny bookshelf, so you no longer have to worry about the problem of shaking, the side horizontal tube has not only beautiful function, but also to prevent items from falling.

【Versatile Bookcase Shelf】The adjustable feet at the bottom are designed to make this industrial bookshelf suitable for different conditions of uneven floors.You can put it in your living room, study room, bedroom, and office to meet your various storage needs and greatly save your space and organizing time.This bookcase is compact and lightweight without occupy much space,you can use it at anywhere you need to better organize your messy items.

【Retro Design Bookcase】The simple yet vintage industrial style design makes this bookshelf a perfect fit for a variety of furniture styles.We choose high quality carbon steel and MDF board for this rustic bookshelf to ensure its stability and solidity so as for your long term uses.
【Saving Space】 Overall size: 16.54"D x 11.02"W x 27.56"H, low bookshelf small occupation in your room and satisfy your needs of storage, perfectly fit for small and narrow space.

【Quick Assemble】We totally understand that you may encounter some problems while assemble our etagere bookcase,so we carefully drill every hole and grind every screw,marked each component with letters,also comes with a detailed illustrated installation manual for your quick installation.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Common Questions From Customers: Q: What is the material of the wood panel?A: Hi,this bookcase is made of thickened MDF board to ensure its sturdiness and stability.Q: What is the maximum load-bearing capacity of the wood panel?A: This book shelf can max load 120lb,perfect for your daily storage needs.Q: What is the size of the bookshelf?A: It's 16.54"L x 11.02"W x 27.56"H.Q: Is it complicated to install the bookshelves? Is there an installation manual or something like that?A: Not at all,you will find it easy to assemble the bookcase as we carefully drill every hole and grind every screw,also attach a detailed illustrated installation manual,all for your smooth and fast installation.Q: Will the 3 tier bookshelf shake? Can the height be adjusted?A: No,this bookcase adopts X-shaped metal wire and adjustable foot to prevent it from shaking or tipping over.

X-shaped Metal Wire we carefully designed this outstanding quality book shelves , back X-shaped wire design, can effectively enhance the stability of the skinny bookshelf. Thickened and Waterproof Top Board Thickened board with waterproof coating boasts its excellent durability, easy to clean with a damp cloth. Adjustable Foot Height of Bottom foot can be adjusted, which ensure the vintage bookshelf keep sturdy on uneven ground and also protect the floor from scratching.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Little Shelf
reviews.reviewText: This shelf came right in time for Christmas. It took a little time to put together but patience saw me through. I use it as a charging station for my phones, etc. fits in a corner in my office.I needed a small shelf to fit in a small space. It feels sturdy. There are some hooks that come with it but I’m not really sure what they are used for. If you are looking for a small shelf this may be the right one for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We picked this up for extra storage near an at-home office/desk. After assembling this, however, we will likely throw this away. This is a waste of time and money.First, this did not come with directions. Even without directions, there are not that many parts to put together. I was able to figure everything out, but pieces don't fit together. The cross supports bow out, the pre-drilled holes don't line up right, the metal shelf supports are all bend, the legs are slightly bent, the bolts to attach the top cross support are not long enough, and the hooks are too wide for the tubes resulting in them dangling.I would never buy this for myself outright. This is a defective piece of junk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This bookshelf is easy to assemble, it looks very cute by the side of my bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and functional
reviews.reviewText: This small bookcase is adorable. The metal itself seems very sturdy and well-made and the shelves are sturdy as well. I love the simple look of the bookshelf, and it works so functionally well in my home. I like the hooks on the side that are provided as extras making it easy for me to organize my space. I think my favorite part of this small bookshelf is the fact that the shelves themselves are deep enough for nice size, books, or larger, bulky items, and it’s modern look add a nice touch to any decor. Overall, I love the small bookshelf and have no complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the light and airy look of this shelving unit. It took me a bit of time to assemble it but I got it done without too much trouble. It was actually kind of fun!I won't be using this for any really heavy-duty storage, so it will meet my particular needs for a pantry shelf just fine. My experience with these kinds of things has been that too much weight on the shelves will cause buckling/sagging. But for chips and cannisters of dry goods like coffee or cereal this is fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy and versatile!
reviews.reviewText: This bookshelf was very easy to put together. It feels very sturdy and high quality for the price. I really like the hooks it comes with to hang items off the side of it. The faux marble shelfs look amazing and feel great. I was really happy with this and use it every day for a-lot more than just books. I would recommend this to anyone and the multiple options are great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor Instructions and Not a Good Design
reviews.reviewText: The instructions to build this are no help at all. I struggled to put the sides on only to find there were bolts already installed on it I had to remove and then put back in to provide stability. There was no indication of this in the instructions. I'm not a fan of the exposed bolts this causes. Not the smoothest design despite it being light weight and usable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bookshelf was easy to put together. Had an issue with one of the screws but it worked out fine once I replaced it. Sturdy and well made
